John Hurt was an incredible actor who brought so much to every role he played. One of the greatest actors of his generation. A big loss.

To quote Morrissey, I would go out tonight but I haven't got a stitch to wear.
RIP Graham Taylor. Brilliant club manager with Watford and Villa but who struggled at international level with England. Do I not like that.

When do you stop saying Happy Xmas and begin wishing people Happy New Year?
George Michael was one of the most talented singer songwriters Britain has ever produced. His music was the soundtrack of my childhood. RIP.
Stick a fork in me I'm done. #merrychristmas
It's The Lion King for me! F*** you Frozen. #merrychristmas

Manuel looking for his pet Rat Basil in Fawlty Towers is still one of the best comedy moments ever. Still incredibly funny. #RIPAndrewSachs
60 Days In Jail is an incredible social experiment. Best show on TV at the moment. Tension and drama throughout. Groundbreaking reality TV.
#SendACelebToJail Felony Griffith.
